name: Goddess Fist
description:
Goddess Fist

Goddess Fist is a Visual Novel game when the story focused on the main character Dewi Suasti on her adventure. She's a celestial deity who come to earth to answer the prayers of human, but she got attacked and suffer critical damage. Agnis a local boy accidently found Dewi Suasti  unconscious drifted to salvage beach. Dewi Suasti lost her arm and also her connection to the celestial realm. How will she survive in the mortal world without her power? Follow her journey to save the humans and get her power back in this visual novel

Current Language : Indonesia

Game Creator Note:

Hello my name is Yayan and thankyou very much for playing my game! I am a college student from Bali and really love playing video game. This is my very first game that i make during my internship in a local game studio

there's some copyright audio that i use in this video, but this is just a prototype and i just to know what others people will think when playing my game
